name: Castle Champion
description:
Overview of game

Fight the bosses and save the king. In this top down shooter your goal is to go through each of the three bosses and save the king! You'll have to be careful though because each time you die you restart from the beginning. With 3 health and bosses that you can't touch, have fun trying to get through this challenging top down shooter. Try and save the King from a skeleton, ogre and dragon!

Gameplay

You have 3 health. Your health resets each level. Be careful and don't run into enemies or you'll have to start from the beginning!

Features

Three exciting battles against 3 unique bosses


Old school art style

Smooth and seamless movement

Background music to go along with the challenge of the game

Spot on hit detection with enemies and bosses

Challenging but so satisfying when you beat all the bosses

Combat system that allows you to have multiple ways to battle
